report.title: Greatest Drug Known to Man
report.author: Mad Merv
report.bodytext: One of the greatest drugs known to man. They should give it away at the convenience store. Possibly one of the greatest to snort, too: Valium slides down like a sugary pixie stick with little or no pain to the nostril. /n /n 10mg, blue (snorted) /n Euphoric, purple hues, no pain, lots of love, desire to sleep standing up, funny grin, bugs bunny cartoons playing in reverse slowly in my head. /n /n 5mg, yellow (ingested) /n A tease. Mild visuals, desire to sleep or lie down to increase its potency. /n /n Next day: possibly a slight hangover. Far less so than many other 'modern' painkillers. This is probably the reason why Valium was so popular: aside from brain damage, there was only a little bit of catalepsy or the shakes. Truly a classic drug and hard to find.
